Hokianga Ferry

By Plane

One of the quickest and easiets ways to get to Rawene is catching a 40 minutes flight from Auckland to the Bay of Islands airport then picking up a car and driving 45 minutes to Rawene.
Air New Zealand
Bay Of Islands Airport car rentall

By Car

If your comming from Auckland you can take the raod through the Waipoua Kauri Forest or through Whangarei and Kawakawa. Both trips take 3 hours and 45 minutes.

By Bicycle

Far North Cycleway
